summary: Sunil Mittal-led Indian Continent Investment plans to sell a 0.8% stake in Bharti Airtel through a Rs 9,300 crore block deal at a 3% discount. Promoters currently hold a 51.25% stake, with Indian Continent Investment owning 2.47%.
fullContent: Sunil Mittal-led Indian Continent Investment plans to sell a 0.8% stake in Bharti Airtel through a Rs 9,300 crore block deal at a 3% discount. Promoters currently hold a 51.25% stake, with Indian Continent Investment owning 2.47%.

title: White House Looks to Oust IEA's Second-in-Command
summary: The United States looks to replace the deputy executive director of the International Energy Agency (IEA), the second-in-command role in the agency that is usually reserved for a U.S. representative, POLITICO’s E&E News reported on Thursday, quoting former U.S.
fullContent: The United States looks to replace the deputy executive director of the International Energy Agency (IEA), the second-in-command role in the agency that is usually reserved for a U.S. representative, POLITICO’s E&E News reported on Thursday, quoting former U.S. officials and energy industry insiders familiar with the plan. American Mary Burce Warlick is currently the Deputy Executive Director of the IEA. Warlick is a retired career diplomat and former U.S. Ambassador to Serbia. Warlick has held a variety of senior leadership positions…

title: What Ancient Rome Can Teach China About Demographic Collapse
summary: China’s current demographic spiral bears a striking resemblance to that of ancient Rome, where changing social norms and drastic population-control measures led to falling birth rates and irreversible decline.
fullContent: China’s current demographic spiral bears a striking resemblance to that of ancient Rome, where changing social norms and drastic population-control measures led to falling birth rates and irreversible decline. Unless it rebuilds the social and economic foundations of child-rearing, China risks following the same path.

title: RBI grants AU Small Finance Bank a universal license, first in a decade
summary: The Reserve Bank of India has granted AU Small Finance Bank a universal banking license, the first in a decade, potentially paving the way for other small finance banks to transition. AU Bank met the RBI's stringent criteria, including minimum net worth, capital adequacy, and...
fullContent: The Reserve Bank of India has granted AU Small Finance Bank a universal banking license, the first in a decade, potentially paving the way for other small finance banks to transition. AU Bank met the RBI's stringent criteria, including minimum net worth, capital adequacy, and asset quality.

title: Waller Emerges as Favorite for Fed Chair Among Trump Team
summary: Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller is emerging as a top candidate to serve as the central bank’s chair among President Donald Trump’s advisers as they look for a replacement for Jerome Powell, according to people familiar with the matter.
fullContent: Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller is emerging as a top candidate to serve as the central bank’s chair among President Donald Trump’s advisers as they look for a replacement for Jerome Powell, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: India’s data protection law poses challenges for AI start-ups: IAMAI
